column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Police Bureau of Investigation and Implementation of the Immigration Regulations of Phnom Penh on June 3
column4: 2019 at 3:20 pm received a Chinese woman who had been taken to the Department  of Veterans Affairs and Youth Rehabilitation.------Police say a Chinese woman
column6: a 27-year-old Chinese woman has no passport and is mentally ill. She said she came to Cambodia in 2018 at Phnom Penh International Airport to look for work.------Currently
column9: so was sent to the Immigration Department to carry out a deportation order.
